OrgName: Pardot, a division of salesforce.com, inc.
activities: This Certification applies to the Salesforce Web-based services branded as Pardot. As part of the Pardot services, customers are permitted to submit electronic data and information, including personal data, into servers used by Salesforce. In this context, Salesforce acts as a data processor and does not determine how its customers’ data is utilized in those servers. Salesforce does not choose or determine the types of data that are submitted to servers used by Salesforce, and any access to, or use of, such data is incidental to completing the contractual obligations of Salesforce as data processor to its customers. Salesforce acts as a data controller when, as part of Salesforce’s internal operations, Salesforce transfers personal data of its current and prospective customers and current and prospective business partners for processing and storage. Specifically, Salesforce collects, transfers, and uses personal data of its current and prospective customers and current and prospective partners for sales, billing, marketing, and business partner recruitment purposes.
corpofftitle1: Vice President, Global Privacy & Assistant General Counsel
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Online, client, customer, prospect and business partner data
